member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: Computes the maximum value across the elements within the sliding window over the input tensor, and optionally returns the indices of the maximum values selected.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: An input tensor of Sizes{ BatchCount, ChannelCount, Height, Width } if InputTensor.DimensionCount is 4, and { BatchCount, ChannelCount, Depth, Height, Weight }if InputTensor.DimensionCount is 5.

summary.para: An output tensor to write the results to. The sizes of the output tensor can be computed as follows.
summary.code: OutputTensor->Sizes[0] = InputTensor->Sizes[0]; OutputTensor->Sizes[1] = InputTensor->Sizes[1]; for (UINT i = 0; i < DimensionCount; ++i) { UINT PaddedSize = InputTensor->Sizes[i + 2] + StartPadding[i] + EndPadding[i]; OutputTensor->Sizes[i + 2] = (PaddedSize - WindowSizes[i]) / Strides[i] + 1; }

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputIndicesTensor
member.summary: An optional output tensor of indices to the input tensor InputTensor of the maximum values produced and stored in the OutputTensor. These index values are zero-based and treat the input tensor as a contiguous one-dimensional array. When multiple elements within the sliding window have the same value, the later equal values are ignored and the index points to the first value encountered. Both the OutputTensor and OutputIndicesTensor have the same tensor sizes.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.DimensionCount
member.summary: The number of spatial dimensions of the input tensor InputTensor, which also corresponds to the number of dimensions of the sliding window WindowSize. This value also determines the size of the Strides, StartPadding, and EndPadding arrays. It should be set to 2 when InputTensor is 4D, and 3 when it's a 5D tensor.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.Strides
member.summary: The strides for the sliding window dimensions of sizes { Height, Width } when the DimensionCount is set to 2, or { Depth, Height, Width } when set to 3.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.WindowSize
member.summary: The dimensions of the sliding window in { Height, Width } when DimensionCount is set to 2, or { Depth, Height, Width } when set to 3.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.StartPadding
member.summary: The number of padding elements to be applied to the beginning of each spatial dimension of the input tensor InputTensor. The values are in { Height, Width } when DimensionCount is set to 2, or { Depth, Height, Width } when set to 3.

member.name: DML_MAX_POOLING1_OPERATOR_DESC.EndPadding
member.summary: The number of padding elements to be applied to the end of each spatial dimension of the input tensor InputTensor. The values are in { Height, Width } when DimensionCount is set to 2, or { Depth, Height, Width } when set to 3.
